hero.title: Accelerating the Expansion of Human Knowledge Boundaries

features.title: AI Research Retrieval & Review
features.subtitle: Intelligent Retrieval
features.description: More than just keyword search. The Agent understands research logic, extracting experimental data and comparative methodologies from massive numbers of papers, automatically generating literature review outlines.
